title: Brussels Sprout Stir Fry With Egg, Chilli, Ginger And Garlic
summary: The recipe Brussels Sprout Stir Fry With Egg, Chilli, Ginger And Garlic could satisfy your American craving in around 45 minutes. This gluten free, dairy free, and vegetarian recipe serves 1 and costs 76 cents per serving. One portion of this dish contains around 7g of protein, 13g of fat, and a total of 175 calories. It will be a hit at your The Super Bowl event. If you have chilli, a knob of ginger, egg, and a few other ingredients on hand, you can make it. 1 person were impressed by this recipe. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 38%. This score is not so super. Try Low-FODMAP Veggie Stir Fry with Wasabi-Ginger Sauce, Stir-fried Brussels Sprout With Dried Sole, and Honey Sesame Shrimp with Brussels Sprout Stir Fry for similar recipes.
